item.title: Report X-2023090166
item.description:
Report X-2023090166

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TEN POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING MEAT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023082046
item.description:
Report X-2023082046

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-28
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP LEAKING CORROSIVE LIQUID INSIDE A WET SOILED TORN OPENED UNSUITABLE LARGE BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023090105
item.description:
Report X-2023090105

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKER IN BAY. RESPONDER ARRIVED AND FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE. CORROSIVE DIAMOND LABEL WAS ON PACKAGE. RESPONDER OPENED THE PACKAGE AND FOUND THAT A CONTAINER LID WAS LOSE. RESPONDER TIGHTENED THE LID AND ABSORBED THE ESCAPED LIQUID WITH ZEP ZORBENT. RESPONDER THEN TRANSPORTED PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023081556
item.description:
Report X-2023081556

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While Loading trucks to go out for deliveries, a package handler found that the bottom of the hazmat box was wet. It was places in a red hazmat tote and brought to the QA cage to be processed as damaged. DescribePack: There was a crack in the plastic 1 Gallon bottle towards the bottom that was about 1/2 inch wide. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in red hazmat tote and brought to the QA cage to be processed.
